text: niccayamaka allah muhminkalukku arul purintirukkinran;. Avan avarkalukku avarkalilirunte oru rasulai(tutarai) anuppi vaittan;. Avar avanutaiya vacanankalai avarkalukku otik kanpikkirar;. Innum avarkalaip (pavattaivittum) paricuttamakkukirar;. Melum avarkalukku vetattaiyum nanattaiyum karruk kotukkinrar - avarkalo niccayamaka itarku mun pakirankamana vali kettileye iruntanar
